course_content.title: Tools in Data Science - Main Course
course_content.content: Main course page for TDS covering Python tools, AI code editors, LLM APIs, and data science workflows. Includes uv package management, GitHub Copilot usage, and API integration techniques.

course_content.title: Python Package Management with uv
course_content.content: Learn to use uv for fast Python package management. Covers installation, virtual environments, and dependency management for data science projects.

course_content.title: AI Code Editors - GitHub Copilot
course_content.content: Using GitHub Copilot for AI-assisted coding in data science. Best practices, prompt engineering for code generation, and integration with development workflows.

course_content.title: Large Language Model APIs
course_content.content: Working with LLM APIs including OpenAI GPT models. Covers API usage, token management, model selection, and cost optimization strategies.

course_content.title: Data Science Project Structure
course_content.content: Best practices for organizing data science projects. Includes directory structure, version control, documentation, and reproducibility guidelines.

discourse_posts.title: GA5 Question 8 Clarification
discourse_posts.content: Use the model that's mentioned in the question. For gpt-3.5-turbo-0125, use that specific model even if AI Proxy supports gpt-4o-mini. The assignment requires the exact model specified.

discourse_posts.title: API Usage Guidelines for Assignments
discourse_posts.content: Guidelines for using APIs in TDS assignments and projects. Always follow rate limits, use proper error handling, and document your API usage.

discourse_posts.title: Python Environment Setup Help
discourse_posts.content: How to set up Python environment for TDS course work. Use virtual environments, install required packages, and ensure compatibility.

discourse_posts.title: GitHub Copilot Best Practices
discourse_posts.content: Tips for effective use of GitHub Copilot in data science projects. Write clear comments, review generated code, and understand the suggestions.

discourse_posts.title: Project Submission Guidelines
discourse_posts.content: How to submit TDS projects properly. Include README, requirements.txt, proper documentation, and ensure code runs without errors.
